flavorText:
"Some detours just aren't worth it."
—Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

foreignData.flavorText: „Manche Umwege sind es einfach nicht wert."—Raff Schneckenkauer, Goblin-Abkürzer
foreignData.name: Schmelzbrutplatz
foreignData.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Immer wenn du einen farblosen Zauberspruch wirkst, fügt der Schmelzbrutplatz einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignData.flavorText: "Algunos atajos no merecen la pena".—Raff Comebabosas, acortacaminos trasgo

foreignData.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Siempre que lances un hechizo incoloro, el Vivero de lava hace 1 punto de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Certains détours sont tout à fait inutiles. »—Raff Gobelimace, accourcisseur gobelin
foreignData.name: Pépinière en fusion
foreignData.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort incolore, la Pépinière en fusion inflige 1 blessure à une cible, créature ou joueur.

foreignData.flavorText: "Alcune deviazioni non valgono proprio la pena."—Raff Mangialumache, goblin delle scorciatoie
foreignData.name: Vivaio Rovente
foreignData.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia incolore, il Vivaio Rovente infligge 1 danno a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「回り道なんて無駄無駄。」――ゴブリンの近道抜け、ナメクジ喰いのラフ
foreignData.name: 溶鉄の生育場
foreignData.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）あなたが無色の呪文を１つ唱えるたび、クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。溶鉄の生育場はそれに１点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: "돌아가는 것만이 능사는 아니야."—고블린 길잡이, 민달팽이 탐식자 라프
foreignData.name: 용암 사육장
foreignData.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)당신이 무색 주문을 발동할 때마다, 생물 또는 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 용암 사육장은 그 목표에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Alguns desvios simplesmente não valem a pena."— Raff Papalesma, atalhadeiro goblin
foreignData.name: Viveiro Fundido
foreignData.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica incolor, Viveiro Fundido causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Иногда не стоит идти в обход».— Рафф Слизнеед, срезающий путь гоблин
foreignData.name: Расплавленный Инкубатор
foreignData.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете бесцветное заклинание, Расплавленный Инкубатор наносит 1 повреждение целевому существу или игроку.

foreignData.flavorText: 「有些路绕不得。」～抄捷径鬼怪食虫拉夫

foreignData.flavorText: 「有些路繞不得。」〜抄捷徑鬼怪食蟲拉夫
foreignData.name: 熱融滋生
foreignData.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）每當你施放無色咒語時，熱融滋生對目標生物或玩家造成1點傷害。

name: Molten Nursery
originalText:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, Molten Nursery deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

rulings.text: Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, Molten Nursery deals 1 damage to any target.
